name: Prey and Predator
status: Locked (becomes Active when Proving Honor is active)
description: Aela challenges you to a hunt-game with teeth: slay Swiftclaw, the infamous sabre cat terrorizing Whiterun’s roads, before she does.

objectives.description: Meet Aela outside Jorrvaskr and accept the hunt terms
Track Swiftclaw’s signs and locate its lair (fills Tracking Swiftclaw clock)
Kill Swiftclaw before Aela does (Race is on with Aela clock)

rewards: Mechanical boon: Aela’s Tracking lesson (GM grants one free invoke on a 'Trail Sign' aspect once per hunt scene for the next arc)
notes: On activation, create clocks: Tracking Swiftclaw (0/3) and Race is on with Aela (0/5). Race ticks when time is wasted or leads go cold; at max, quest fails (Aela kills it first).
